title: MsuSongInfo
description: Details about a song for YAML and PCM generation

Artist.description: The artist(s) that created the song

Album.description: The album in which the song was released on or the game the song is from

Url.description: A url in which the user can purchase the song/album

MsuPcmInfo.description: Details that are passed to msupcm++ for generation

MsuSongMsuPcmInfo.description: Details that are passed to msupcm++ for generation

Loop.description: The loop point of the current track, relative to this track/sub-track/sub-channel, in samples

TrimStart.description: Trim the start of the current track at the specified sample

TrimEnd.description: Trim the end of the current track at the specified sample

FadeIn.description: Apply a fade in effect to the current track lasting a specified number of samples

FadeOut.description: Apply a fade out effect to the current track lasting a specified number of samples

CrossFade.description: Apply a cross fade effect from the end of the current track to its loop point lasting a specified number of samples

PadStart.description: Pad the beginning of the current track with a specified number of silent samples

PadEnd.description: Pad the end of the current track with a specified number of silent samples

Tempo.description: Alter the tempo of the current track by a specified ratio

Normalization.description: Normalize the current track to the specified RMS level, overrides the global normalization value

Compression.description: Apply dynamic range compression to the current track

File.description: The file to be used as the input for this track/sub-track/sub-channel

SubTracks.description: Files which will be concatenated together to form the input to the parent track

SubChannels.description: Files which will be mixed together to form the input to the parent track
